attributes.action: Save Local Pubs! Save your Local
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We need the Prime Minister to make Supermarkets charge the same for their Alcohol sales as Pubs making it fair compeition. Save your Local before its to late.We ask you to support your Local Pub. With  recent increase on a Pint of Beer and the Smoking ban, up to 27 PUBS a week are closing(The figures were compiled by CGA Strategy for the British Beer & Pub Association.). 
At this rate of closure, many villages across Britain face a pub-less future in the next few years.
